title: Dark Star Varus Voice Change Suggestion (With Audio)

replies.body: This is really cool, I was the sound designer on DS Varus and so thanks for posting this up here! It feels very fitting for this skin line. Would you mind sharing some of your thought process for what you thought the VO should sound like, what approaches you took when designing?

Well, I firstly glanced at the other Dark Star skins for other champions {{champion:412}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:59}} 

>***

Dark Star {{champion:412}} and Dark Star {{champion:59}}  were the only skins out of the whole skin line with edited voice effects, but I was aware that thresh received a complete new voice due to being a 1820rp skin. 

But what I found a little surprising is that some of the other Dark Star skins {{champion:110}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:61}} didn't receive any to no changes to their voices. I know voice effects are primarily a 1820rp skin line thing but there are some exceptions like the Program skin line where {{champion:16}} has a majorly different voice sound for only being a 1350rp skin.

>***

Anyway in terms of how I thought the voice should sound like, I took a major inspiration from Dark Star {{champion:412}} Since they were both technically released at the same time for a purpose since there was a trailer featuring both skins being showcased in-game.

In case you were curious, I used Adobe Audition to produce this effect. I asked a Rioter not a while back on what audio software they used and Adobe Audition was a good choice I was told but I was also told that you also use other software due to more editing choice complexity.

I also read Dark Star Varus's skin lore, and it mentioned that he was "erasing entire planetary systems as if they were never there". Looking at his splashart he is charging his Q and just blasting planets into pieces. I really wanted to bring out the sinister/destruction feel that he has since he was also called a "interstellar titan containing multitudes within his eldritch mind".

That's something that I thought both {{champion:412}} and {{champion:110}} shared most than the other Dark Star skins. In addition I think the final outcome ended up fitting the titan feel a lot, if I do say so myself.

>***

One more thing, Varus was only one of the voices that I had edited before. I can post more of my edits on here, but the reason why I haven't done so is because I don't think that's something that some people are that interested in usually.
A liiiiiiittle tooooo processed but I like idea. I always feel like nice skins, such as this one, deserve new VO or some type filter
HOLY FUCKING FUCK! This is epic!

I love this voice, please consider doing something like it. I too thought it was unfitting for Thresh to have the processed voice but Varus, his duo, did not. This voice would make the skin an instant buy. Great work op!
I like how he is now c
